ingredients: +   3/4 cup olive oil,   +   1/4 cup balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon dark brown sugar, 2   +   1/2 teaspoons minced garlic,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 6 cups mixed baby greens, 3  pears, thinly sliced, 1 cup dried cranberries, 1 cup toasted pecans,   +   3/4 cup cubed Havarti cheese,   +   1/2 cup toasted sliced almonds
